author: Charlie Hall
title: Plague Inc. developers working on a mode where you save humanity
description: Plague Inc. developers will add a mode to the game where you save humanity instead of destroy it. They have also donated $250,000 to help fight COVID-19.
content: Image: Ndemic Creations Ndemic Creations is also making a sizeable donation to fight COVID-19 Plague Inc. is a game where you customize a virus with the goal of infecting as many people as possible. In the past few weeks that conceit has flashed over from dar… [+2084 chars]
